description:
This course will take you step by step through creating a long term passive income with Amazon Kindle Publishing.It's direct and too the point and ideal for anyone of any skill or experience level in this field.This course uses all FREE resources to get your book up and running in just hours rather than Weeks or Months.

This course is a little over 1 hour in length from start to finish. I refuse to pad out this course to 10 hours what I can teach you in just one. Time is important and for that reason I will not be wasting any of yours.

This course is structured in Video and Audio form with added over the shoulder instructions on how to do what is being explained.

If you want to make a long term passive income with ebooks on Amazon Kindle today then this course is for you.
title: Amazon Kindle Publishing - Passive Income Plan
